summary: Ensysce Biosciences, Inc. has authorized the creation of 4,500 shares of Series B Convertible Preferred Stock, which will rank senior to existing Series A Preferred Stock and all junior stock in terms of dividends, distributions, and liquidation payments. Holders of Series B Preferred Stock are entitled to a 4% annual dividend, increasing to 8% upon certain triggering events, and can convert their shares into common stock at a conversion price of $2.50 per share, subject to adjustments.
